titleStmt.title: To the right worshipful our worthy patriots of our country of Cornwall, assembled at Truroe the 27th of December, anno, 1659 The humble remonstrance of us gentlemen, and free-holders of the county of Cornwall.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: This Declaration was proclaimed by order in the Market-Place at Truroe the 31 of December, 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
